messageId.description: Unique identifier for this message to support de-duplication.

occurredAt.description: ISO-8601 timestamp for when the domain action occurred.

correlationId.description: Correlation identifier shared across the saga or HTTP request.

causationId.description: Identifier of the message that triggered this message.

traceId.description: Distributed tracing identifier propagated via headers (optional).

messageType.description: Routing key or type name published on the broker.

payloadVersion.description: Semantic version of the payload schema (major.minor.patch).
